projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce application built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, drag-and-drop functionality, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather dashboard that displays current weather conditions, forecasts, and interactive maps using multiple weather APIs.

projects.title: Social Media Analytics
projects.description: A data visualization tool for social media analytics with interactive charts, real-time data processing, and comprehensive reporting features.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with React and Bootstrap, featuring smooth animations, dark mode, and mobile-first design.

projects.title: Chat Application
projects.description: A real-time chat application with multiple rooms, file sharing, emoji reactions, and user presence indicators.
